title: Eco-Modern Studio Retreat with Fireplace in Orunia
description: Step into this newly renovated eco-conscious studio in the blossoming neighborhood of Orunia, Gdansk. Designed with the modern professional in mind, the open-plan living area features a cozy fireplace and high-quality finishes throughout. Enjoy the serenity of a well-insulated space, complete with user-friendly video intercom and convenient elevator access. At a spacious 34 sqm, this studio blends style, comfort, and sustainability for easy urban living.
neighborhood_description: Orunia offers an authentic local vibe, known for its family-friendly atmosphere, historic charm, and emerging shopping and dining spots. With excellent public transport and highway access, you can easily commute to Gdansk's business districts or explore the city's coastal pleasures. Great schools and green pockets nearby make this an attractive neighborhood for those seeking both energy and relaxation.
lifestyle_benefits: peaceful enclave close to nature and city hotspots
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-minded professionals relocating to Gdansk and seeking convenience, style and sustainability in one accessible urban package.
market_positioning: Positioned in the heart of the resurging Orunia district, this studio stands out for its modern eco touches and full-feature comfort, offering exceptional value against other central-location properties in its segment.
